introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.paragraph-1: Dragon Tiger Wild is the latest game from IDNLIVE EUROPE, offering even more excitement with the addition of the Wild Card. This game brings a fresh experience for Dragon Tiger fans, with fantastic winning potential of up to 127x! LET’S GET WILD!!!
introduction.paragraph-2: The objective of the game is to predict which card is higher between Dragon and Tiger, and to use the Wild Card to create wild bonus combinations for even bigger prizes.

rules.title: General Rules
steps: The game is hosted by a dealer.
The game uses 8 decks of cards in one Shoe.
At the start of each new Shoe, the dealer will draw a card to determine how many cards will be burned or discarded. A maximum of 10 cards can be discarded.
After the betting time ends, the dealer will reveal one card as the Wild Card, then deal one card each to the Dragon and Tiger.
The side with the higher value wins. The highest card is the King, worth 13 points.
If the result is a tie, half of the bets on Dragon and Tiger are returned. A tie bet only wins if both Dragon and Tiger have the same value.

dragon-tiger-wild-card.title: DRAGON TIGER WILD CARD
dragon-tiger-wild-card.content: Dragon Tiger Wild uses a standard deck of 52 cards, without jokers. Here are the card values used in the game:

wild-bet.title: WILD CARD BET
wild-bet.description: As mentioned in the introduction, Dragon Tiger Wild includes new gameplay elements and exciting bonuses. Here’s an explanation:
wild-bet.description-2: The Wild Card determines the win with bigger rewards than normal bets. There are 5 types of Wild bets:
wild-bet.dragon-wild: This bet wins if the Dragon Card wins and its value is the same as the Wild Card.
wild-bet.tiger-wild: This bet wins if the Tiger Card wins and its value is the same as the Wild Card.
wild-bet.super-wild: This bet wins if all three cards, the Wild Card, Dragon Card, and Tiger Card, are equal.
wild-bet.dragon-pair: This bet wins if the Dragon Card and Wild Card have the same value. (The Dragon Card doesn't need to win)
wild-bet.tiger-pair: This bet wins if the Tiger Card and Wild Card have the same value. (The Tiger Card doesn't need to win)

dragon.title: Dragon
dragon.description: Pays if the Dragon's card value is higher than the Tiger's.

tiger.title: Tiger
tiger.description: Pays if the Tiger's card value is higher than the Dragon's.

tie.title: Tie
tie.description: Pays if both Dragon and Tiger cards have the same value.

dragon-wild.title: Dragon Wild
dragon-wild.description: Pays if Dragon wins and the Dragon and Wild cards have the same value.

tiger-wild.title: Tiger Wild
tiger-wild.description: Pays if Tiger wins and the Tiger and Wild cards have the same value.

super-wild.title: Super Wild
super-wild.description: Pays if the Dragon, Tiger, and Wild cards all have the same value.

dragon-pair.title: Dragon Pair
dragon-pair.description: Pays if the Dragon and Wild cards have the same value.

tiger-pair.title: Tiger Pair
tiger-pair.description: Pays if the Tiger and Wild cards have the same value.
